primary.reasoning: Button #0 has a dark background color (#2A222B) and action-oriented text 'Sign up', making it the primary CTA. It stands out as a more vibrant option compared to the secondary button.

secondary.reasoning: Button #1 has a light background color (#FFFFFF) and is less prominent with the text 'See more', making it the secondary action. It is clearly different from the primary button's color group.

personality.targetAudience: business professionals and creatives looking for form solutions.

survey_basics.title: Typeform
survey_basics.description: Typeform is a platform for creating interactive forms, surveys, and quizzes.
survey_basics.target_audience: Businesses and individuals looking to gather information

sections.section_description: Overview of Typeform's platform and features.
Various tools available for creating forms, surveys, and quizzes.
Pre-designed templates for different use cases.
Templates and tools for different teams.
Information about Typeform as a company.
